ðŸ“– Summary: Auto PY to EXE is a tool that converts Python scripts (.py) into executable files (.exe) using a graphical user interface. It leverages PyInstaller to bundle the script and its dependencies into a single executable, making it easier to distribute Python applications to users who may not have Python installed.
